message.pixelplay.screen_setup_started: §a[PixelPlay] §eSetup started! Click on the first screen block.
message.pixelplay.screen_first_block_sel: §a[PixelPlay] §eFirst block selected at %d, %d, %d. Click on the second block.
message.pixelplay.screen_second_block_se: §a[PixelPlay] §eSecond block selected at %d, %d, %d. Type: /pixelplay screen setup name <preset_name>
message.pixelplay.screen_no_active_setup: §c[PixelPlay] No active setup. Use /pixelplay screen setup to start.
message.pixelplay.screen_setup_incomplet: §c[PixelPlay] Setup incomplete. Select both blocks first.
